commentary: length ball at the stumps, looks to push it on the off side but gets an inside edge towards square leg, he wants to come back for the second but Jadeja sprints to the ball from deep square leg, a one-handed pick up and a direct hit to find Smith short despite the dive
length ball angling on to the pads, finds himself in awkward, cramped position and misses the flick
length ball on middle and leg, flicks it towards fine leg for two more
short of length outside off, a tennis forehand from Smith to hit to the deep midwicket boundary
length ball on the stumps, defends it on the leg side
fuller on the stumps, flicks it towards midwicket but they don't take the single
short of length outside off, steers it behind point
another attempted scoop and he gets some bat this time, over short fine for a couple
length ball around off, looks to scoop it over but misses
length ball around off and middle, skips down and flicks it towards midwicket, comes back for the second
short of length outside off from around the wicket, left alone
aims for a yorker at the stumps, Smith backs away and takes it on the full, hits straight down the ground. A desperate chase from Gill to pull it just inside, they take three
fuller around off, defends it towards the right of extra cover and sneaks in a quick single
fuller at the stumps, gives himself some room and hits it inside out through extra cover for a single
backs away this time to the short ball and ramps it over slips for four
clears his front leg and hits it over extra cover and they collect two
pitched up again, defended back
fuller around off, pushes on the off side

another full delivery gets Jadeja a wicket. This time it hits Lyon full on the shoe and the umpire had no hesitation in giving him out lbw. He reviews immediately but that's more in hope than anything else. No bat involved there, the impact is in line and Lyon is already near the boundary line as the third umpire asks for the Hawk-Eye. Would have crashed into middle and leg
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller outside off, driven through covers but only for one
Smith has decided to cut loose. Goes for the slog sweep and dispatches this to deep square leg boundary
length outside off, moves away off the seam to beat the bat as Lyon was looking to defend it. A mild enquiry for caught-behind but not out

and the plan has eventually paid off. Another short of length delivery outside off, Starc cannot resist the temptation of another pull but this time it's a top edge and Gill runs a couple of steps forward and to his left and settles under it
short of length outside off, Starc once again goes for the full, wasn't in control but enough on it to clear mid-on. Gill chases it but it is out of his reach
length ball on the leg stump and Starc pulls it away nonchalantly, there is a fielder at deep square leg but he doesn't mind, clears the boundary line on the full
back to bouncer but on the leg stump, Starc fails to connect the hook
a high full toss, looked like that slipped from Saini's hand. But thankfully it was way outside off. Saini apologies, called a no-ball though
a bouncer but Starc had no problem ducking under that
length ball at the stumps, stands tall and punches it back
skips down the track before thrusting his bat and pad at this length ball
fuller around off, looks to go for a big hit over long-on but doesn't middle it. A single to deep midwicket
length ball around off, goes back and pushes it to the right of Jadeja but he is quick to field it himself
too full around off, pushes back towards the bowler
fuller around off, pushes it towards covers
another short ball, this time outside off. Starc goes at it again but doesn't connect

bowler_batsman: Saini to Starc, (no ball) FOUR runs
commentary: short again, and Starc takes him on, pulls powerfully to deep square leg. And Saini's overstepped too, so it's another no-ball
full outside off, patted softly into the offside for a quick single
and yet another short ball, this is Starc getting some of his own medicine perhaps. He was in a tangle against this, unsure of whether to evade it, ends up fending it away and it rolls to square leg
another short ball, rises up to his shoulders, Starc goes for the pull, is late on it and gets it on the toe end as the ball plops down towards cover
another bouncer, going across him but that didn't rise as much. Starc was ducking, and luckily for him the line took it away from him
bouncer on leg stump, sways under
tossed up on off, driven on the front foot, cover fields
length on the stumps, clipped to midwicket
down the track but ends up yorking himself, manages to jam bat down to keep the ball static. And another no ball called by the third umpire.
too short, stays legside of it to cut, but can't beat point
floated up on a sixth stump line, left alone
length on the stumps, clipped to midwicket
length on the stumps, defended back

Steven Smith has got a hundred and the cricket gods are smiling. Outstanding knock. He's shown some rare emotion on getting there too, punching the bat in the air. Not the best ball to bowl to a batsman on 99, half volley on the stumps. Ends up being on the pads due to Smith's moving across, and he picks it off behind square nicely to get to the landmark
length outside off, Smith pushing forward to defend, gets an inside edge towards mid-on. Jadeja's lightning quick there and Starc's thoughts of a quick single are quickly put to rest
fuller outside off, defended to cover
length ball on the stumps, steers it into the covers after being a bit squared up
boom. Disdainful thump down the ground with a lofted on-drive. Didn't move feet, didn't need to because he stayed balanced and made good connection
length on the stumps, defended from the crease
floated up on the stumps, Smith calmly plants front foot forward to defend. As if he's batting on 79, not 99
outside edge goes past slip. Stretched forward to defend that, but was too much inside the line and got a healthy edge
length ball on off, defended
staying in his crease is Starc, and playing it off the pitch almost, fuller on the stumps, patted away
floated up around off again, he stays back this time and pats it gently towards mid-on
fuller, drawing him on the front foot to defend on off
full on the stumps, it was there for the flick with Smith moving across, and he gets bat on it, but can't beat square leg
fuller on the stumps, pushed into the covers and they settle for just a single
another bouncer, but too far down leg and Starc doesn't even have to move to evade it
follows it up with the fuller one going across him, Starc goes for the punch without moving his feet, beaten.
good short ball, but well dealt with too. Rises up to his grille, didn't expect it to rise so high but got hands up to defend. Wore it on the gloves
full, slanting across him, goes for the drive and is beaten
tossed up outside off, comes on the front foot to punch it, gets a single which means he'll keep strike with Smith on 99
length ball sliding down leg, he misses the flick

cleaned him up. Jadeja gave this one a lot of air, and got the flight perfect, ended up almost yorking Cummins, who played all around it. Seemed to lose it in the flight almost and was late to react. stumps broken. Jadeja's having quite a day
length outside off, punched away but cover comes across to his left to field. Jadeja over-stepped on that one, so it's a no-ball.
length outside off, stays beside and punches to deep cover to move to 99
very full on the stumps, blocked
fuller on off, defended on the front foot
back of a length, swivels to pull it, didn't rise really high and he hit it at around waist height. There is a deep square leg so only one
coming in a mite, fuller on off, defended from the crease
fuller outside off, comes on the front foot to meet it, with bat close to body, defends to cover
length outside off, defended back to the bowler

back of a length outside off, Smith's moving across so you think he's a bit too close to the ball but he's so well balanced that when he punches, it makes sweet, sweet connection. Deep point has to run to his left to gather
fuller outside off, came on the front foot to drive, got it off the inside half to mid-on
good length outside off, zips through to Pant
that's bounced over Pant. Banged in short and fast, but too short and Cummins ducks under. It almost swerved after bouncing and thought Pant moved to his left and leapt up, that one evaded him
length outside off, coming in with the angle, left alone
fullish around off, moves across again and clips it off his pads between mid-on and midwicket
fuller outside off, defended to extra cover
good length on the fourth stump, he's moved across and defended with a straight bat, to mid-on
full on off again but a confident front foot defence by Cummins
fuller on off, comes on the front foot to defend
fuller on a sixth stump line, easy enough leave for Cummins
short outside off, cut away but there is protection now, with a deep point
too full on the toes, you can't bowl there to Smith in this form, and he effortlessly flicks it to the midwicket boundary
back of a length outside off again, punched nicely once again but this time can't beat the cover fielder
back of a length on a fifth stump line, left alone
length on the fourth stump, moves across and taps it softly through midwicket
back of a length in the channel, left alone
magnificent by Smith. Made Bumrah bowl fuller with that last shot, shuffled across and clipped it off his toes through midwicket
lovely. Small error in length by Bumrah and Smith is just so good. Back of a length outside off, stands tall and punches beautifully through cover
had to jab bat down a mite quicker than expected. Length ball outside off, straightens a touch and skids on, defended
fuller this time, he's half forward with bat close to pad, gets a thick inside edge to leg gully
slanting into him, and Cummins stays in his crease to defend carefully back down the pitch
length ball jagging in, defended solidly from the crease
short ball, swivels and keeps his pull down, one run to deep square leg
fuller on off, moves across and on-drives crisply but can't beat mid-on

another loud shout but he was struck outside the line. Siraj wants a review, but Rahane isn't convinced. Length ball jagging in, and actually that's not too much outside the line but it does look like it would go over the stumps. Smith was shuffling across, and replays show the impact was in fact marginally outside off, and it was also going over. Good call by Rahane to not review.
bouncer first up, but directed down leg side, so Cummins is able to not get bat near it.

timber. Sensational from Bumrah, went clean through Paine, having opened up a big gap between bat and pad. On a length, jagging in sharply, helped by the angle too. It's not full enough to drive, but has drawn Paine into striding out to drive it, and then zipped through in the yawning gap. Stumps shattered.
good length, nipping in on off, moves across to punch it to mid-on's right
length in the channel, pushed back to the bowler
fuller on off, tapped gently to cover and Paine is alive to the possibility of a quick single, calls Smith through for a well judged run
and starts with the line attacking the stumps, but Smith moves across and clips to fine leg

no shot offered and loud shout. They'll not go for the review, that was probably a bit high. Length ball outside off, seamed in sharply and Paine was shouldering arms, struck on the thigh pad. Siraj was convinced he'd got his man, but Rahane wasn't convinced enough to review the 'not out' decision.
length ball nipping in from outside off, plays with the angle to clip to square leg
bouncer, but going down leg and an easy one to duck under
length outside off and jagging back in, Smith's covered the line and brought his bat down in time to nurdle it through backward square leg
length outside off, pushed to mid-on
That one kept low. Back of a length on a fifth stump line, left alone by Smith, and it hardly bounces, dies on Pant before reaching him
length ball, keeping on a tight line on off, defended into the offside
full on off, driven on the front foot but can't get past short cover
keeps it on that hard length and in the channel, Paine shoulders arms again
fuller, homing into the stumps, Paine defends with a straight bat
length ball angling into the channel, but Paine is confident in leaving it alone
length attacking the stumps, tapped towards mid-on
length nibbling around off, defended towards point
back of a length outside off, nipping in, but Smith's shuffle means he's well placed to present a straight bat in defence
back of a length in the channel, defended back with soft hands
good length on a fifth stump line, steered to point
fuller, some late movement in the air. Smith comes on the front foot to cover drive but gets an inside edge that thuds into pad
back of a length outside off, stands tall and punches, but straight to cover
length ball in the channel, left alone

Bumrah strikes with the new ball at the stroke of lunch, Green falls for a 21-ball duck. Was a length ball around off that jagged back on to beat the forward defence and hit the front pad. An appeal for lbw and the umpire had no doubt in mind. Replays confirm it would have hit the top of middle
banged in short but around off, doesn't rise much but enough for Green to duck under, swings a lot down the leg side after passing the batsman
length ball in the channel, shouldered arms this time
beats the outside edge. Fuller outside off, Green goes for the drive but ends up playing down the wrong line and misses
length ball, just around off, stays in the crease and blocks
length ball around off, moves across and works it towards deep-backward square leg
a touch fuller, a touch closer but still far away from Smith to invite any response
length ball, sixth stump, left alone once again
length ball in the channel, left alone
length ball around off, moves back and across and blocks
fuller around off, stays back and pushes it towards mid-on
length ball, just outside off, left alone
short outside off and pulled away towards midwicket
another length ball in the corridor, Smith shoulders arms
length ball around off, kept a touch low. Goes back and defends
length ball in the channel, left alone
length ball at the stumps, Smith got behind the line and defended
full and wide outside off, left alone
fuller around off, drives it towards mid-off
length ball swinging away from the fifth stump, left alone
pitched up again, driven but mid-on makes a diving stop to his left
fuller, almost a yorker on the fifth stump, squeezes it out towards cover-point
length ball in the corridor, left alone
fuller but so wide that it has been called one
that one jumped off from good length. Was around fourth stump so Smith had to play, he looks to defend but it moves away to beat the bat
length ball around fifth stump, defended from the front foot
a touch fuller but far away from Smith, ignored again
length but further away from Smith. He is not interested in chasing those ones
length ball, in the corridor, a bit of movement away. Shouldered arms
length ball outside off, left alone
almost a yorker, keeps it out and pushes it towards mid-off
length ball on middle and leg, turns it towards short leg
length ball around off, defended watchfully from the back foot
length ball on the pads, plays a back-foot leg glance
length ball around off, goes deep and turns it towards short leg
flatter and quicker around off, goes back and blocks
fuller around off, pushes it towards mid-off
short of length, some extra bounce this time, goes back and steers it towards cover
short and wide once again, Smith goes back and punches it to the left of the cover fielder for another four
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards mid-on
short and wide, Smith rocks backs and nails the cut through point, his tenth four in 67
length ball at the stumps, defended
pushes it towards mid-on from the front foot
length ball on the stumps, defended
tossed up around off, dip and turn to beat the bat and hit the pads. An appeal for lbw but perhaps outside off and too high
flatter outside off, chops it towards point
flighted on the stumps, comes forward and drives it towards long-on
fuller outside off and whipped though extra extra cover. Jadeja is quick and keeps it to two
length ball at the stumps, defended on the front foot

Oh Matthew Wade! What have you done! Not much different from one of his earlier dismissals - against Ashwin - in the series. Uses his feet and looks to chip it towards midwicket but the ball stops at him, takes the leading edge and goes aerial towards mid-on. Bumrah pedals back there and takes it comfortably
fuller on the off stump, defended on the off side
length ball on the stumps, punched towards extra cover off the back foot
another sweep and guess what, another hit for Vihari. Left leg this time
fuller around off, punched down the ground, was in the air for a while but to the left of the non-striker. No chances for Jadeja to reach there or mid-on to cut it off
flatter trajectory on the stumps, turns it towards the backward square leg with soft hands
length on middle and leg, nudged towards short fine leg
length ball on the stumps and defended
pitched up again and Smith brings out the sweep. Was tossed up on the leg stump and he hits it behind the deep square leg fielder
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards mid-off
length ball at the stumps, punched towards mid-off from the back foot
fuller around off, blocked on the front foot
length ball around off and middle, comes forward and defends it on the leg side
swept again but this time to Vihari's left, Gull fields it at backward short leg
fuller on the stumps and another fully-blooded sweep finds Vihari, this time on the other leg. A bit of forearm as well
fuller and around and driven through extra cover, a firm, confident stroke with a nice front-foot stride
tossed up around off, goes for the sweep and pings Vihari on the leg at short leg. The physio is out
fuller on the stumps, pushes it to short mid-on
fuller down the leg side, please the paddle sweep but cannot beat the leg gully
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
length ball around off, lunges forward and blocks
length ball, angling in at 87.3kph, defended from the crease
length ball around off, defended
fuller and wider and Smith whips it through point, a bit of a misfield as well and Smith picks up another boundary
fuller outside off, digs it out towards extra cover but cannot beat the fielder
flatter on the stumps, pushed back
uses his feet but Jadeja shortens his length, defended
flatter and quicker, defended on the back foot
tossed up around off, mistimed towards mid-off
tossed up, driven to long-on coming on the front foot
goes back and punches this length ball to mid-on
drilled down the ground, and it's a first fifty in the series for Smith. Full ball, he took a stride forward and blitzed it straight back
length ball, plays with the turn to tap it to backward square leg
tossed up outside off, driven to mid-off from the inside half
tossed up on the stumps, moves on the front foot to turn it to square leg
tossed up outside off and straightaway Wade goes down to paddle sweep it fine

taken at slip. That's a wicket out of nowhwere almost, because Labuschagne was looking so comfortable. Length ball on off stump, he was going back and making room - he's been doing that - to punch through the offside but the ball bounced a bit more than he would have expected perhaps and took a thick edge. Rahane at slip is alert and pulls off a smart catch, low to his right.
length on leg stump, turned to midwicket
too short, sits up and he goes back to flay this through point. century partnership between these two
tossed up on middle and leg, worked to midwicket on the front foot
length outside off, goes back and cuts, but to the fielder at point
length on the stumps turning into him, goes back and taps it down towards the short leg
tossed up on off, comes on the front foot to defend
some turn for Ashwin, but it's a mite short. Smith stays in place and pushes it to the short mid-on
comes down the track to clip this through midwicket
a bit shorter, he makes room and thrashes a cut, but can't beat point
floated up on the stumps, turned to short leg on the back foot
fuller, comes forward and pushes it back down the pitch
flatter on leg stump, a bit shorter and that allows him to go back and flick through square
length on the stumps, stands tall to punch to cover
tossed up outside off, and that is delicate touch from Marnus. Stays back and lets it glide off the bat through backward point
length, worked through midwicket
down the track but Jadeja shortened his length. Smith does well to stay legside of the ball and defend it with soft hands to cover
length outside off, goes back and creates room to punch through cover

chipped in the air but safe. Down the track and he is looking to go just over mid-on, gets it a bit on the inside half of the bat but well enough to carry over the in-field and well short of the man on the boundary
makes some room to punch this length ball to extra cover
tossed up on middle and leg, patted down towards backward square leg
down the track but the ball dips on him and he's forced to block it to short mid-on
length on the stumps, goes back to flick, can't beat short leg
a bit short again, he goes back and cuts again, but this time straight to point
length on off, powerful wrists at play as he flicks on the back foot. Can't beat midwicket
fuller outside off, driven to extra cover on the front foot
fuller outside off, flicked to mid-on
too far down legside and Pant blocks it with his pads
too short and wide outside off, he rocks back to cut this powerfully through point. The drizzle might have made the outfield slow, but there's no stopping that one
on the stumps, plays it straight, to the bowler's right
fuller, angling in on off, defended back down the pitch
back of a length on off, flicked off his hips through midwicket
fuller on the stumps, punched to mid-on
keeps the bowling straight but Marnus judges it well this time, comes on the front foot and flicks it off his pads to bisect the forward and backward square leg fielders

full on the stumps, driven with a strong bottom hand from the crease and very straight but India have had a very straight mid-on for the pacers. Rohit the man there and he leaps up to stop the ball. He's standing beside the pitch
darted on a length, goes back and defends to the bowler's right
good length on the stumps, goes behind and defends
keeps it on the stumps and Smith defends into the offside with an angled bat, on the front foot
skips down the track and pushes it back to the bowler.
tossed up on off, defended to cover on the front foot
fuller on off, comes on the front foot and pushes to cover
keeps it straight and on the stumps, he flicks but can't beat he forward square leg
full on the stumps, pushed back down the pitch
full on the stumps, nudged to square leg on the front foot
similar length and line, but a bit fuller, Smith connects with the on-drive while moving across to send it through midwicket

big shout but the umpire shakes his head. And Rahane has reviewed. Think Smith will be safe, umpire's call possibly. This seamed in from outside off and struck him on the left pad, just above the knee roll as he was moving across. And ball tracking says that was bouncing over the stumps. So India lose a review
length angling in to the stumps, pushed to mid-on
fuller outside off, big stride out and he drives powerfully - all hands and wrists - but can't beat cover. well timed
tossed up again but fuller and on leg, comes on the front foot to drive it between mid-on and midwicket
tossed up a bit on off, he comes on the front foot to defend to cover
length on off, stays back and uses wrists to whip it through square
length on off, carefully defended back
length on the stumps, goes back and flicks to midwicket
this one is fuller on off, and has him stabbing at it, takes a thick edge to roll towards point
full on the stumps, punched back, Siraj gets a hand to it on the follow through and manages to stop it, outstretched to his right
fuller outside off, mis-times his drive towards mid-off
length outside off, and he uses wrists to twirl it away but Rahane at gully is alert and dives to his right to stop the ball
fuller, pushed to cover
length outside off, pushed into the offside
length on off, punched back to the bowler's right
a bit more towards leg stump, which allows him to flick it off his thigh pad to fine leg
this one is nibbling around off stump and he taps it to the short midwicket
length attacking the stumps, turns it to square leg
good length on off, stays still and uses wrists to turn it to midwicket
length outside off, punched to cover
stays still this time, and flicks this off his thigh pad but square leg dives to his right to stop the ball
length and at the stumps, moves across to flick to square leg
attacks the stumps but this is too full, allows the batsman to on-drive it. Ashwin at mid-on has to run back and pull it in before the boundary
fuller outside off, patted towards cover
on leg stump, turned towards square leg
length coming in on off, defended solidly towards mid-on
no shuffle this time from Smith as Bumrah bowls this on the fourth stump, just a defensive push but it takes the inside edge to roll to square leg
length ball angled into the stumps, Smith shuffles, flicks off pad, can't beat midwicket
length on off and this one bounces a bit too but Smith negotiates it comfortably, offering the full face of the bat to defend from above his waist
muted appeal from Bumrah, this one seams in to hit him on the left pad, but that was probably high and going down leg. Smith shuffling across missed it
and that one spat up off a fuller length. There have been a few that have done that. Smith getting behind it to defend gets it on the splice of the bat almost
back of a length on off, gets behind it and pushes to the bowler's right
full on the stumps, tucked off his pads through midwicket
mis-times his pull shot to Ashwin's right at mid-on. Siraj slipped in the short one but it didn't bounce as much and Smith got it off the bottom half of the bat
length ball angling in on off, the shuffle means Smith is right behind it and offers the full face to push it to the bowler's right
length on off, Smith's shuffling across as always, tucks it to square leg off his pads
back of a length, pushed back to the bowler's left
keeps it on the stumps, flicked to backward square leg
straight on the stumps, patted to midwicket
good ball. Keeps it on off now and gets it to move away, hisses past the outside edge as the batsman is left groping for it
full on the stumps, blocked from the crease towards midwicket
angling into leg stump, and he plays with the angle to push it towards midwicket
back of a length outside off now, and he taps it softly to cover for a quick single.
what a start to Smith vs Bumrah. Half volley outside off and he launches into a cover drive that races to the boundary. Commanding shot
keeps it straight to Marnus too, who taps it to midwicket

that one surprised Smith a bit, but he dealt with it well. Bounced a bit more off a length than he expected, Siraj still keeping it on middle and leg, but Smith removes his top hand while glancing it fine, from above waist height
good bowling, slipped in the surprise bouncer. Smith late on the pull and doesn't connect as it whistles past his helmet
he goes across and Siraj is targetting the stumps here, Smith turns it away, but can't beat backward square leg
strays a bit too far down leg, Smith not interested in getting bat near that
length ball on middle and leg, turns it towards backward square leg
banged in short on leg stump, he goes back and taps it down to square leg off his ribs and that is stumps.
back of a length going across him, ends up on off, defended
back of a length on leg stump, flicked off his hips but can't beat backward square leg
goes across him on a length this time, but the batsman isn't hanging back due to the earlier short ones, calmly works it through square leg
another bouncer on leg stump, this one is easier to duck under
bouncer on leg stump, Smith ducks under
drifts down leg, and is worked past leg slip
tossed up on leg, flicks through square leg
stays in his crease to push it back to the bowler
comes on the front foot to tap this to midwicket
turn and bounce now. Pitched outside off and spun sharply, takes the thigh pad to go to the keeper. Smith did well to keep his hands and bat clear of playing a shot
tossed up, goes right back and is almost front on while tapping this down to short leg
goes back and whips it off his pads through midwicket
fuller, pushed back to the bowler
quicker and changes the line to off, Smith stays legside of the ball but hands follow it and he gets a faint edge that plops on the ground
flat on leg stump, flicked, but can't beat midwicket
a bit shorter, goes back to flick this to backward square leg
fuller, stays in his crease and gently pats it to the bowler's right
goes across and shoulders arms, off-break spins from off to strike him on the left pad and rolls away
down the track to this flighted ball on leg, and whips it off his toes through midwicket
length outside off, quicker, mis-times his punch to cover
looking to be aggressive is Marnus. Goes for the hard sweep, doesn't connect. Ball rolls to keeper off pad
takes a step down and thumps a drive to the bowler's left but Ashwin does well to stick his hand out and stop it
tossed up, flicked to midwicket
fuller, defended down the pitch on the front foot
flatter, quicker, shorter, bounces a bit more than Smith expected and he can't time his cut very well. Point fields
good length outside off, stays beside it and steers to point with bat away from body
length on off, defended
length ball, goes back and flicks, but short leg fields
fuller on the stumps, stays legside of the ball with his pad and defends
tossed up nicely, down the track and flicked well, but straight to midwicket. Rohit's been excellent there today, and he fields and has a shy at the non-striker's end.
tossed up and defended on the front foot
down the track and defends
tossed up, pushed to long-on

a bit of an animated appeal, for a bat pad catch but I don't think he got any bat on it. Rahane doesn't think so either and doesn't review. Good ball, tossed up outside off and spinning in to defeat his forward prod, takes the top of the pad and pops up, Pant and short leg both go for it, Pant holds it. Rahane almost reviewed, but then didn't
length on the pads, pushed through midwicket
fuller on the stumps, defended on the front foot
well outside off, full ball, Smith not tempted into driving at it
fuller on the stumps, defended to cover from the crease
stays back this time, pitches on leg and turns a bit, keeps it down
spots him coming down and bowls it flatter and shorter, defended back
fuller, driven to cover
down the track again, Ashwin shortens length again, Marnus happy to pat it back in defence
tossed up on off, big stride forward to defend
flatter, he was looking to come down again, jabs it to midwicket
lovely. Confident shot. Dances down the track, gets to the pitch and shows the full face while lofting it straight back over the bowler's head. One bounce into the fence
tossed up, comes on the front foot to turn it to the short leg fielder
saw him coming down and bowled it flatter, he adjusts and taps it towards midwicket
fuller on off, defended towards mid-on
length around off, blocked back to the bowler
length ball angling into him, uses wrists to flick through midwicket
too full, picked off his pads, but good work by Rohit at midwicket again, diving to his right to stop it
fuller, pushed to mid-on
back of length on off, gets right behind it to defend
down the track again, uses wrists to work this between midwicket and mid-on. A diving midwicket gets a hand to it but can't prevent a single
hangs back this time, length ball on off, turns it with the spin, keeps it away from the short leg fielder
tossed up on legstump again, comes down the track to take it on the half volley and flicks, but to midwicket
clipped to square leg

ooooh almost. Ashwin draws a misjudgement from Smith but not enough to get the wicket. Drifts in to him and loops nicely, Smith beaten as he's stepping down to drive, hit on the pad and it rolls to slip
tossed up, bit of drift into him, comes on the front foot to flick to midwicket
length around the fourth stump, patted back down the pitch
back of a length on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler's right
good length on a fifth stump line, defended back down the pitch on the front foot
punched back to the bowler
through him. Sharp movement from outside off, jags back in as Marnus is looking to play it into the offside, sneaks through between bat and body
fuller, driven to mid-off
down the track that time, gets to the pitch and pushes it to long-on
floated up on off, he's hanging back and drives it gently from the crease to the bowler's left
flattish around off, gets down to paddle sweep it. can't beat backward square leg
down the track again, gets to the pitch and drives fluently to long-on. Very assured in his footwork
tossed up fuller, goes back and turns it off his pads through square
tossed up but he twirls the bat while flicking through midwicket, finishing with a flourish. Looking more and more like vintage Smith
straightens the line but the batsman does well to tickle it fine, taking one hand off the bat. Backward square leg has to run to his right to field
Marnus is stepping it up now. Too many full balls from Siraj this over, and he's happy to stride on the front foot and drive them. This one is through mid-on
fuller outside off, plays with an angled bat to point
peachy Too full outside off, and he unfurls a lovely cover drive to get to his fifty. Best way to get there
ooh, inside edge onto pad and rolls to the keeper. was pushing away from body with no feet movement
authoritative drive on the front foot to a fuller ball outside off, creamed through extra cover
nicely tossed up, going down leg, he pulls out of the nurdle and Pant gathers
tossed up very full, clipped off his toes, but straight to midwicket
quicker one and fuller, he was hanging back, jabs his bat down in defence
nicely tossed up, comes on the front foot and flicks, but Rohit at midwicket dives to his right and stops it
stays back to this tossed up one and lets it come on to the bat and works it to leg gully
Smith is up for the battle. Oh  yes he is. Down the track, to the pitch and lofts him over mid-on. This is a bowler that's troubled him through the series
keeping to that leg stump line, Smith seemed to take a step across and wait, and once he knew where the ball was headed shuffled further and clipped it through square leg
goes for the straighter line again, Smith nudges it off his pads towards leg gully
good length around the fourth stump, pushed to the bowler's left
length outside off, Smith with the trademark movement across and punches to midwicket
very straight, worked off the pads through square leg
length ball on off, nudged to midwicket
tossed up on the stumps and Smith whips it through midwicket, finds the gap and another boundary
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on, was looking for a single but it's not there
length ball on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
uses his feet and pushes it back towards the bowler
length ball around off, stays back and defends
fuller around off, pushes it towards extra cover
short of length around off, goes back and turns it towards square leg
length ball on the pads, flicked towards backward square leg
length ball around off, gets on his toes and defends
length ball around off, stays in the crease and defends
fuller and angling in, flicked towards midwicket
length ball but down the leg side, Smith moves across and looks to glance first before taking his bat away at the last moment
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards short midwicket
fuller around off, defended from the front foot with bat and pad next to each other
fuller around off, pushes it towards mid-on once again
length ball on the stumps, defended towards mid-on
length ball around off, goes back and across to tap it towards midwicket
length ball around off, looks to defend but the ball hits the outer half and rolls towards the gully region
length ball on middle and leg, turned towards midwicket this time

another boundary, the Indians thought they had him there though. Was a length ball on middle and leg, Smith went for the flick, was in the air for a while, Vihari dived to his left from backward square leg but couldn't get there
once again on the fuller side but just outside off this time, defended back
make that two as Saini bowls another full delivery, and Smith just presents the full face of the bat and it races past mid-on
length ball on middle and leg, flicked towards fine leg
length ball in the corridor, left alone
fuller around off and driven past mid-off, gets his first boundary
a bouncer this time, Smith ducks under it without any fuss
length ball around off, defended down the wicket
length ball around off, stays back and defends again
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball at the stumps, Smith was moving towards the off side. Had to defend in the end
length ball around off, stays back and defends
another full delivery, punched towards mid-on but Jadeja makes a diving stop to his left
length ball around off, stays back and defends
too full, clipped towards the right of mid-on to get off mark
fuller on the stumps, defended by Smith but Saini has bowled a big no-ball here

one debutant gets another. Full and fast, Pucovski moved across and looked to flick it away. His head though was falling over and he missed it altogether. No inside edge. Labuschagne is having a chat with him but no review taken and Pucovski's maiden Test innings comes to an end. The impact was umpire's call and it would have gone on to hit off and middle
fuller on the pads, flicked towards square leg where the fielder fumbles and concedes a single. These two have added 100 now
short outside off, Pucovski takes it from there. Not in the complete control but perhaps he knew there was no deep square leg. He gets two as it lands safely
short but too short and down the leg side as well. Pucovski doesn't have any problems dealing with that
length ball around middle and off, defended towards mid-on from the back foot
fuller again and punched firmly this time to the left of Ashwin at mid-on. He puts in the chase to keep it to three
fuller around off, pushes it towards mid-on
length ball around off, stays back and defends
length ball around off, played with the soft hands towards covers, an early call for a single and comfortably done in the end
length ball around off, looks to drop and run but the fielder was quickly approaching the ball
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-on, just with the chase and the slide to keep it to three
length ball around off, 137.2kph, defended towards mid-on
length ball outside off, punched towards extra cover
137.4kph, length ball outside off, goes back and punches it towards sweeper cover for a couple
length ball in the channel, shouldered arms once more
length ball around fifth stump, left alone
fuller around off, punched towards mid-off from the front foot
length ball around off, defended from the crease
fuller around off, pushes it towards covers for a quick single
length ball around off, defended from the back foot

back of a length in the channel, nipping back, left alone. Good judgement though that was a mite closer to off stump than he would have thought. A fairly non-threatening first over from Saini apart from this last ball.
short outside off again, rides the bounce nicely to cut this to deep point
fuller and wider outside off, left alone
length on off, tapped back down the pitch
back of a length outside off, but he moves across and slaps a pull shot to the long-on boundary and raises fifty on debut. He's had chances but it's how you convert them. Well played
uh oh, he'll not want to remember his first ball. To a fellow debutant, but it's short, wide outside off, nothing in it, and an easy put away to the cover boundary
well played, tossed up outside off but he was down early to sweep it fine. The leg slip had gone out so he knew he'd be safer playing it
thwack. The angle from around the wicket gives Marnus room to work with outside off, and it's a tad short, so he rocks back and absolutely thumps it through point
length ball on the stumps, goes back and flicks towards leg gully
length ball going across him tapped into the offside
tossed up on off, but he's been dealing with that line particularly well by giving himself room and going deep in his crease. Smacks it through point, cutting it from in front of the stumps
length on the stumps, goes back to clip this with the turn towards mid-on

not fully in control but safe. Another short ball, he has to fetch it from outside off without quite having moved decisively across and the ball hangs in the air but there's no one at deep midwicket and it drops safe

huge mix up but he's safe. Back of a length outside off, and he creams it beautifully through extra cover. The ball won't go to the boundary, Bumrah picks it up, but slips a bit. The throw ends up being not great, which is fortunate for Pucovski because he had gone three quarters of the way down for the third run while Marnus hadn't moved. In the end he turned around and had enough time to get back before the relay throw came to the keeper
length outside off, steered to point
length outside off, defended to extra cover
full on off, driven on the front foot firmly but mid-on, who is very straight, fields it
dug in short outside off, but too short, sits up and allows him to go across and flat bat a pull through midwicket
comes on the front foot to solidly defend down the pitch

a bit shorter, he goes back this time and uses wrists to flick this through backward square leg. A bit sloppy from the fielder moving to his left, should have intercepted that. In the end it goes all the way to the boundary with the man in front of square on the boundary unable to keep it inside with his boot, while running around
given room and he goes deep in his crease to create the length to this tossed up ball to punch through cover. Superbly timed
tossed up on a length on off, goes back and makes room this time to punch to extra cover
length on off, goes back and plays with the turn to tap it down on the legside, bounces to leg slip
tossed up, comes on the front foot and defends
he keeps it in the channel on a length, defended into the offside
back of a length on a fourth stump line, he's moving across slightly and defends it back down the pitch
back of a length outside off, left alone
fuller on the stumps, nudged to the man at deep backward square leg
fuller, punched to mid-on
appeal from Siraj but that's too high. Jags back in sharply from outside off to hit him on the thigh pad, cut him in half almost with a big gap between bat and pad as he's looking to push
swept hard, but straight to backward square leg

oooh, he had skipped down the track but got it only to short leg. Was well out of his crease, if the man there had collected cleanly, had an opportunity to flick it to the stumps. But that's a tough take, with the batsman coming down the crease and hardly any reflex time
comes on the front foot to work this to backward square leg
length ball on the stumps, turned to backward square leg

and Pant has held on to that. Oh no he hasn't! On target short ball from Siraj. Banged in and climbing up to his ribs, he was moving across to try and pull it. Got a glove on it and the ball loops up behind Pant. He turns around and dives, the can't hold on to it but he's falling quicker than the ball is, and in the same direction, so he makes another grab at it as he's falling down. Did he get his gloves around the ball in time or as it hit the ground? The umpires have ruled it was ball hitting ground first. And on second viewing, it appears the right call. The ball hit the ground first before being gathered cleanly.
back of a length on a fifth stump line, punched to cover
back of a length outside off, comes across and punches to mid-off
bouncer, but dug in too short and he bends his knees to watch it harmlessly sail over
back of a length slanting into him, defended solidly into the offside
fuller outside off, comes forward with an angled bat to steer through point
tossed up again, pushed to cover
tossed up, skips down the track to take it on the full and drives it bak to the bowler off the toe end
shorter again, and he's quick to rock onto the back foot and punch through backward point
and back to exemplary flight and length now, but defended solidly on the front foot
too short, sat up outside off and he rocks back to cream this cut shot through point. Ashwin possibly trying the quicker one, drags it short
tossed up, drifts in, patted down to leg gully
full on off, nicely forward to the pitch to defend
full on off, goes to drive, gets the inside half of the bat at the bottom end, to mid-on
good length, homing in on off stump now, defended towards mid-on with that flourishing, Steve Smith like defence
full down leg, they're trying to get him out in that fashion again. He's shuffled across looking to flick, but doesn't connect. Mild excitement from Pant and Siraj but that one flicked the pad
length ball in the channel, hint of movement in, defended from the crease
length outside off, left alone

dropped by Pant behind the stumps. Lovely bit of bowling by Ashwin but he's not going to get the reward for that. It's the loop and drift that does it again, Pucovski is drawn forward, but the ball dips and doesn't turn, takes a thin edge as he pushes with hands going away from pad. Pant unable to hold on
good batting, got one that was tossed up a bit fuller and wider and leans into a cover drive. Loose balls are not too many, have to take advantage of what comes
oooh testing from Ashwin. Tossed up on the stumps ,and he's drawn forward but the ball dips on him so he's not to the pitch, goes off the pad towards the leg slip
now floats it up outside off, cut off the back foot to point
flighted on the stumps, defended
goes back and is forced to jab this away down legside since it was quicker
seaming into him from back of a length and he flat bats a pull, but it's straight to the backward square leg
again a bit of a shuffle across to defend
back of a length in the channel, he's moving across a tad and defends it back to the bowler
fuller on leg stump, clipped to the man in front of square
length ball on leg stump, flicked to deep square leg
goes a bit wider of the crease to get it angling in sharply from a length, defended
fuller around middle, pushed to mid-on
fuller on the pads, goes for the flick but cannot get it past backward square leg
flatter again, swerving away from the batsman, defended from the back foot
flatter and quicker, goes for the cut but is beaten
tossed up around off, pushes it towards mid-off
uses his feet, reaches to the pitch of the ball and pushes it towards extra cover, Ashwin chases the ball to prevent any runs
fuller around off, pushes it towards mid-on
short of length around off, punched towards mid-off from the back foot
slips in a bouncer, Pucovski had no problem evading it. Sways away from the line of the ball
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks with a vertical bat
fuller around off, defended towards extra cover
length ball around off, comes forward and defends
uses his feet to this length ball. Still not to the pitch of the ball as Ashwin drops it short. Defended on the leg side
length ball at the stumps, spinning in, Labuschagne is watchful and defends it
fuller around off, drives it inside out through covers for a couple
length ball at the stumps, defended
goes back and away this time and punches it towards extra cover
length ball on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
length ball around off and middle, tucked away towards short midwicket
length outside off, pushes at it and gets beaten as the ball holds its line. Like a legcutter. A mild appeal from the fielder behind the stumps but Bumrah knows
fuller around off, pushed to the right of mid-on for a quick single
length ball angling in towards the off stump, blocked again
length ball around off, defended from the crease once again
length ball around off, defended
a touch fuller, stays in the crease and blocks
length ball spinning in sharply, defended from the back foot
length ball at the stumps, defended from the back foot
length ball around off, some turn but Pucovski goes back and punches it through covers after giving himself some room
length ball, spinning in, flicked towards short midwicket
length ball on the pads, turns it on the leg side
fuller on the stumps and punched to the left of mid-on by Labuschagne. The fielder dived across but couldn't get a hand
length ball in the channel, Labuschagne could leave it easily
beaten again.. Length ball outside off, comes forward to defend this time but the ball just moves away to beat the outside edge
falls short. Length outside off, Labuschagne pushes tentatively, gets a thick outside edge but it lands well in front of first slip
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it back towards the bowler
length ball at the stumps, defended
fuller on the leg stump, comes forward and blocks
uses his feet, Ashwin bowls it outside leg but Labuschagne adjusts easily to work it towards midwicket
length ball around off, defended from the crease
length ball, spinning on to the pads, goes back and flicks it towards backward square leg
tossed up at 82.5kph this time, length ball on middle and leg, defended
91.7kph, flatter and quicker at the stumps, defended from the back foot
short of length outside off, Labuschagne bends low and drops his hands
length ball around off, drops it on the off side and sets off, Bumrah ran towards the ball but Pucovski was quicker
fuller around off, flicked but cannot beat the square leg fielder
fuller on the pads, flicked to the right of mid-on but only a single
length ball at the stumps, defended towards mid-on
fuller around off, defends it towards covers from the front foot
similar line and length and blocked once more
fuller, just outside off, Labuschagne stays in his crease and dead-bats it
fuller and angling in, blocked
short of length around off, moves across a bit and flicks it towards deep midwicket for another three. Played it late and used his wrists to find the gap
length ball around off, punched towards the bowler from the back foot
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
138.1kph, banged in really short this time, Labuschagne ducks under comfortably
short of length outside off, Labuschagne swivels and pulls it down, rolling his wrists over it, gets four to backward square leg
length ball outside off, a saber bar leave from Labuschagne
short of length outside off, left alone
fuller around off, looks to defend but gets an inside edge on to the pads
length ball in the channel, shouldered arms
a bouncer but down the leg side, hardly bounces. Pant collects it near his knees. Pucovski moves outside the line of the ball and evades it
short of length, looks to flick but gets in two minds, the ball hits him near the ribs area
a bouncer but well outside off. Pucovski was looking to pull it first but bails out after he realise it's not within his reach
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks again
a touch fuller around off, comes forward and defends again
length ball around off, comes forward and defends
short of length around off, taps it towards midwicket
a touch fuller around fourth stump, a good leave by Labuschagne
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks under his eyes
length ball in the channel, left alone
short of length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
137.2kph, length ball outside off, left alone
fuller once again, pushes it towards extra cover
overpitched outside off once more and Labuschagne too makes full use of it, pushes it past Saini at mid-off, who puts in the chase and pulls it just inside
a touch fuller around off, punches it between mid-off and the bowler and gets three. First runs for a right-hander on the off side
length ball, angling in on to the pads, Pucovski goes for the flick but misses. An appeal for lbw. Looked close to me unless there was some bat involved. The umpire wasn't interested
length ball around off, a big front-foot stride and defended
length ball at the stumps, stays back and defends it on the off side
length ball around off, pushes it towards midwicket for one
fuller around off, punched firmly but straight towards mid-on
short of length around off, good bounce there for Bumrah, but Pucovski adjusts well, plays it down with soft hands
length ball around off, looks to defend but the ball hits the outer half and goes into the ground
a touch fuller and closer, that back and across movement helps Pucovski to turn it in front of square leg
length ball around off, goes back and across and defends
length in the channel, left alone
fuller this time, Pucovski moves across and plays an on-drive. Beats the mid-on and gets three more

top edge but Pucovski is safe. Banged in short by Siraj, around off and middle. Pucovski goes for the pull but isn't in control. The fine leg is squarer and it beats him to his right. A couple of bounces and over the boundary line
fuller on the stumps, punches it towards mid-on
length ball down the leg side, too far away to flick
short of length and angling towards the rib cage, flicks it down towards the backward square leg
fuller in the corridor, left alone by Labuschagne, good carry to the keeper
length ball in the channel, 141.7kph, left alone
a touch fuller on the stumps, moves across and flicks it away through midwicket for three
length ball around off, defended on the off side
length ball around off, blocked once again
length ball around fourth stump, moves across and defends it towards mid-on
beauty! A length ball around fourth stump, Pucovski looks to defend but gets beaten as the ball holds its line
length ball in the channel, left alone
fuller on the stumps, goes a bit across and pushes it wide of mid-on, off the mark with a couple

first wicket!. A touch fuller this time, Warner once again tries to reach it with his hands, hardly any footwork there. Pushes at it, gets a healthy outside edge and Pujara takes it with reverse cups, in front of his face at first slip
fuller and wider, Warner flashes at it with no feet movement, misses
length ball around off, stays back and defends it on the off side
fuller around off, pushes it back towards the bowler
short of length around off, stays back, moves a bit across and defends
138.8kph, length ball around off, gets behind the line and blocks
length ball outside off and moving further away, left alone
length ball around off, taps it through covers and sneaks in another single. Not really sprinting
138.1kph, short of length around off, Warner hops in the air and blocks
length ball around off, Warner putting his legs to test as he drops it on the off side and hustles to the other end
first runs for Pucovski in Test cricket, length ball on the pads, tucked away towards fine leg
fuller but down the leg side, Pucovski goes across, tries the flick but misses
length ball around middle and off, defended from the back foot
fuller, on middle and leg. A hint of swing in to the batsman, flicked away
and Warner is off the mark straightaway, a length ball outside off, stays in his crease and punches it through covers for a couple
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks. A maiden to start off
here's the first short ball. Around middle stump. Goes for the pull but it's too high
in the corridor, and shouldered arms once again
length ball in the corridor, left alone
a touch fuller. Just outside off, comes forward and blocks
length ball in the corridor, a bit of movement away, left alone
